Over the last decades, contamination has become a global concern and conventional petroleum-based plastics are an important issue with regards waste management. The food packaging industry is the main plastic demander as it accounts for about half of all used worldwide packaging (de Oliveira & de Melo, 2019), generating high amounts of waste. Due to this problem, the packaging industry has promoted the development of new biodegradable, non-toxic and edible materials.
